sentences.en: All the armed groups will be disbanded.
sentences.cn: 所有武装团体将被解散。

sentences.en: And then the bank shall disband upon approval of the People's Bank of China.
sentences.cn: 经中国人民银行批准后解散.

sentences.en: Disband: This will disband the entire guild.
sentences.cn: 解散: 这个功能会解散整个公会.

sentences.en: In July he issued a decree ordering all unofficial armed groups in the country to disband.
sentences.cn: 他于7月份下令解散国内所有的非正式武装组织。

sentences.en: The official trades union council voted to disband itself and re-form as a confederation.
sentences.cn: 这个官方的工会委员会投票决定解体然后重新组成联盟。

sentences.en: When she was made to disband the force, some of its aggrieved members turned against her.
sentences.cn: 后来她被迫解散该小组, 一些愤愤不平的前组员转而反对她.

trans.tran_en: to stop existing as an organization, or to make something do this
